ygData.subject: Re: research
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes the words are destroyed early on it s not a problem the words are very common basically I d suggest that all Necros pump up quite a few practice points
ygData.messageBody:
Yes the words are destroyed early on it's not a problem the words are very
common basically I'd suggest that all Necros pump up quite a few practice
points into Research and also research all the low level spells that you can
level 24 and below even 29 is relatively easy to do since the words are
pretty common. Once you hit 34 though make sure your research skill is up
extremly high as the words are not very easy to find especially for the
level 34 pet spell.

Naeeldar Dark Elf Necromancer of the 34th Circle

-----Original Message-----
From: wolfie <lachdanan@...>
